\new Score
<<
    % Make the glisses a little thicker, make sure they have at least a little length, and allow line breaks
    \override Score.Glissando.minimum-length = #4
    \override Score.Glissando.springs-and-rods = #ly:spanner::set-spacing-rods
    \override Score.Glissando.thickness = #2
    \override Score.Glissando #'breakable = ##t

    \context Staff = "piano"
    \with
    {
        instrumentName = #"piano"
    }
    {
        <<
            \context Voice = "voiceOne"
            {
                \time 4/4
                \times 2/3 {
                    \clef "treble"
                    <
                        \tweak style #'diamond
                        c'
                        \tweak style #'diamond
                        e'
                        \tweak style #'diamond
                        a'
                    >8
                    (
                    \glissando
                    <
                        \tweak style #'diamond
                        d'
                        \tweak style #'diamond
                        fs'
                        \tweak style #'diamond
                        b'
                    >8
                    \glissando
                    <
                        \tweak style #'diamond
                        bf
                        \tweak style #'diamond
                        d'
                        \tweak style #'diamond
                        g'
                    >8
                    \glissando
                }
                <
                    \tweak style #'diamond
                    c'
                    \tweak style #'diamond
                    e'
                    \tweak style #'diamond
                    a'
                >4
                )
                <
                    \tweak style #'diamond
                    c'
                    e'
                    \tweak style #'cross
                    a'
                >2
            }
            \context Voice = "TempoVoice"
            {
                \tempo 4=60
                s1
            }
        >>
        <<
            \context Voice = "voiceOne"
            {
                <
                    c'
                    \tweak style #'diamond
                    e'
                    \tweak style #'cross
                    a'
                >2
                r2
            }
        >>
    }
>>
